BRIEF-Universal Coal PLC Fy2020 Guidance Forecast Group Sales Up 25%

Stock Markets 29 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 11:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Universal Coal PLC Fy2020 Guidance Forecast Group Sales Up 25% Oct 28 (Reuters) - Universal Coal PLC : * FY2020 GUIDANCE FORECAST GROUP SALES UP 25% TO 8.4MT, ATTRIBUTABLE SALES UP 21% TO 4.6MT * QUARTERLY ROM COAL PRODUCTION OF 2.8MT, UP 51% * FY2020 GUIDANCE EBITDA OF A$73 MILLION, ATTRIBUTABLE $42 MILLION AT US$68/TONNE * GROUP COAL SALES FOR QUARTER OF 1.9MT, UP 58% ON PCP * DECLARATION OF FINAL DIVIDEND OF A$0.01 PER SHARE * MAINTAIN A POSITIVE LONGER-TERM OUTLOOK ON THERMAL COAL PRICING ENVIRONMENT * ESTIMATED A$46 MILLION OF CAPITAL EXPENDITURE REQUIREMENTS FOR YEAR
